channel.title: [PI] Lost Legacy Release
channel.description:
[center][b]I'm Nighel From R-S
This server is not DSPK server base = new era and client base is DSPK
Server Link: [url=http://uppit.com/cuflvtpuzqmg/Project_Lost_Legacy.rar]Lost Legacy Server[/url] Client Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?g78999ep4y77yme]Lost Legacy Client[/url] Cache (for if autocachedownloader dont work.) [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?4z6c6s4ql4ha6of]Cache(Put in C:/)[/url] Mirror Client: [url=http://uppit.com/uh7yzx86z2a5/Lost_Legacy.rar]Client Mirror[/url]
Some Features: 602 Anim/Gfx Tormented Demons Skilling Special Pking/PvP PvP Drops Curse Prayers With Anims/Gfx/Effects Minigames (Pest Control,Duel Arena Etc). Gameframe/Hp bar/10x Hit/Hitmarks Switching EP system And Much More..
Pictures are from old advertise lazy to make others
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2na8kts.png[/img]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/35ixg5w.png[/img]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2nv4j2u.png[/img]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/14w58c7.png[/img]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/n52bnr.png[/img]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/24qiux4.png[/img]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/55qneo.png[/img]
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/xbzkoo.png[/img]
[url=http://www.gifsoup.com/view1/1411631/soulsplit-ll-o.gif]http://www.gifsoup.com/view1/1411631/soulsplit-ll-o.gif[/url]
Credits: Nighel (Server) Mr Pedobear (Client/Server) New era (Base) DSPK (Client base) Nick (Server stuff)[/b][/center]
